review:
Great fun in shared screen setup with 3-4 people.

Easy to learn and hard to master, was happy to find this gem and had lots of laughs playing this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164444510', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1504517409}
review:
It's....a part of HELP: THE GAME, you're helping somebody. I can't be too harsh on the game, given the story behind how it was made and what it was made for.

Pros:

-Helping a worthy cause if purchased as part of HELP: THE GAME
-Cute design, but not the cutest.
-Working AI you can play against if you have nobody to play with 

Not-Pros (Sort of Cons):

-AI has unlimited "bumping" power, never runs out of water to propel itself with; AI has distinct advantage
-Not much depth, very simple (Bump them into the water by propelling yourself with a water gun, don't get bumped into the water, 3 lives, up to 4 players, a powerup here and [kinda] there)
-Not very thrilling
-NOT a game for hours (or even minutes) of entertainment

Supporting HELP: THE GAME gets you a copy of this.
